 1 <?php
 2 
 3 App::uses('CrudBaseObject', 'Crud.Controller/Crud');
 4 
 5 /**
 6  * The Base Crud Listener
 7  *
 8  * Licensed under The MIT License
 9  * For full copyright and license information, please see the LICENSE.txt
10  *
11  * @codeCoverageIgnore
12  */
13 abstract class CrudListener extends CrudBaseObject {
14 
15 /**
16  * Returns a list of all events that will fire in the controller during it's life cycle.
17  * You can override this function to add you own listener callbacks
18  *
19  * - initialize: Called at the same time as CrudComponent::initialize()
20  * - startup: Called at the same time as CrudComponent::startup()
21  * - beforeHandle : Called before CrudAction is executed
22  * - recordNotFound : Called if a find() did not return any records
23  * - beforePaginate : Called right before any paginate() method
24  * - afterPaginate : Called right after any paginate() method
25  * - invalidId : Called if the ID format validation failed
26  * - setFlash : Called before any CakeSession::setFlash
27  *
28  * @return array
29  */
30     public function implementedEvents() {
31         $eventMap = array(
32             'Crud.initialize' => 'initialize',
33             'Crud.startup' => 'startup',
34 
35             'Crud.beforeHandle' => 'beforeHandle',
36 
37             'Crud.beforePaginate' => 'beforePaginate',
38             'Crud.afterPaginate' => 'afterPaginate',
39 
40             'Crud.recordNotFound' => 'recordNotFound',
41             'Crud.invalidId' => 'invalidId',
42             'Crud.setFlash' => 'setFlash',
43 
44             'Crud.beforeRender' => 'beforeRender',
45             'Crud.beforeRedirect' => 'beforeRedirect',
46 
47             'Crud.beforeSave' => 'beforeSave',
48             'Crud.afterSave' => 'afterSave',
49 
50             'Crud.beforeFind' => 'beforeFind',
51             'Crud.afterFind' => 'afterFind',
52 
53             'Crud.beforeDelete' => 'beforeDelete',
54             'Crud.afterDelete' => 'afterDelete',
55         );
56 
57         $events = array();
58         foreach ($eventMap as $event => $method) {
59             if (method_exists($this, $method)) {
60                 $events[$event] = $method;
61             }
62         }
63 
64         return $events;
65     }
66 
67 }
